title: League client won't open
body:
I have just installed the pbe client and played a match. I left to go back on the live client but I just can't open it. I restarted my comp but I still cannot open the client. I really do not want to re install everytime I want to swap servers. is there a way I can play?
I have tried to run as administrator but had no luck

replies.body: Running as admin is a good start, because this usually happens when a setting is blocking the pbe patcher from launching.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should fix this up for you.

Same problem here

And i have tried reinstalling both
